privacy.pageDescription: PromptHub Personal Data Processing Policy in accordance with Federal Law No. 152-FZ
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

section1.title: 1. General Provisions
section1.p1: This Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as the Policy) defines the procedure for processing personal data and measures to ensure the security of personal data taken by PromptHub (hereinafter referred to as the Operator).
section1.p2: The Policy is developed in accordance with Federal Law No. 152-FZ dated July 27, 2006 "On Personal Data".
section1.p3: By using the prompt-hub.site website, you agree to the terms of this Policy. If you do not agree with the terms, please do not use the site.

section2.title: 2. Key Definitions
section2.def1: Any information relating to a directly or indirectly identified or identifiable natural person (personal data subject).
section2.def2: Any action (operation) or set of actions (operations) performed with or without automation tools with personal data.
section2.def3: PromptHub ‚Äî a person who independently or jointly with other persons organizes and/or processes personal data.
section2.def4: A natural person to whom the personal data processed by the Operator belongs.

section3.title: 3. Personal Data Operator
section3.p1: The personal data operator is PromptHub, which processes personal data of users of the prompt-hub.site website.

section4.title: 4. Categories of Personal Data Processed
section4.p1: The Operator processes the following categories of personal data:

cat2.title: Profile Data (voluntarily provided by the user)
cat2.item3: Social media links (Telegram, GitHub, Twitter/X, LinkedIn)

section5.title: 5. Purposes of Personal Data Processing
section5.purpose1: User identification and providing access to personal account
section5.purpose4: Analyzing user behavior to improve service quality
section5.purpose5: Protection against fraud and metric manipulation (anti-fraud)
section5.purpose6: Providing communication with users regarding service operation

section6.title: 6. Legal Basis for Processing
section6.basis1: Consent of the personal data subject (Article 9 of Federal Law No. 152-FZ)
section6.basis2: Performance of agreement on service use (Article 6 of Federal Law No. 152-FZ)
section6.basis3: Exercise of rights and legitimate interests of the Operator (Article 10 of Federal Law No. 152-FZ)

section7.title: 7. Methods of Personal Data Processing
section7.p1: The Operator processes personal data using the following methods:
section7.method2: Data storage in a secure SQLite/PostgreSQL database
section7.method3: Hashing of identification data (IP, User Agent) using SHA-256
section7.method4: Data transmission via secure HTTPS protocol

section8.title: 8. Personal Data Protection Measures
section8.measure1: Use of secure cookies in production environment
section8.measure2: Hashing of IP addresses and User Agent using SHA-256 cryptographic algorithm
section8.measure3: Session protection through JWT tokens with secret keys
section8.measure4: Anti-fraud system to prevent unauthorized access
section8.measure5: Restriction of access to personal data only to authorized employees

section9.title: 9. Use of Cookies and Analytics
section9.p1: The site uses cookie technology to ensure functionality and improve user experience:

cookie1.name: Necessary cookies
cookie1.desc: Used for authentication, storing language settings, and ensuring basic site functionality. Cannot be disabled.

section9.analytics1: Collection of anonymized visit statistics, analysis of user behavior to improve service quality. Can be disabled in cookie settings.

section10.title: 10. Rights of Personal Data Subjects
section10.right1: Receive information about the availability and content of their personal data
section10.right2: Require clarification, updating, or deletion of their personal data
section10.right3: Withdraw consent to the processing of personal data
section10.right4: Receive a copy of their personal data
section10.right5: Appeal the actions of the Operator to the authorized body for the protection of the rights of personal data subjects
section10.right6: Protect their rights and legitimate interests in court
section10.contact: To exercise your rights, send a request to: privacy@prompt-hub.site

section11.title: 11. Terms of Processing and Storage of Personal Data
section11.p1: Personal data is processed and stored for the following periods:
section11.period1: Authorization data ‚Äî until the user deletes the account
section11.period2: Technical data (hashes) ‚Äî 12 months from the last activity
section11.period3: Interaction data (views, likes) ‚Äî until account deletion or upon user request

section12.title: 12. Changes to the Privacy Policy
section12.p1: The Operator has the right to make changes to this Policy. When making changes, the date of the last update is indicated at the beginning of the document. The new version of the Policy comes into force from the moment it is posted on the site.

privacy.contactText: For all questions related to the processing of personal data, please contact:

cookieConsent.title: üç™ We use cookies
cookieConsent.description: We use necessary cookies for site functionality and analytical cookies to improve service quality. You can customize the use of cookies according to your preferences. Learn more in our

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are necessary for basic site functionality (authentication, interface language, security). They cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with the site by collecting anonymous statistics. This data is used to improve service quality.

cookieConsent.moreInfoText: Detailed information about what data we collect and how we use it is available in our

privacyCheckbox.including: in accordance with Federal Law No. 152-FZ, including
